------- Additional comments from ccheney@openoffice.org Thu Oct 30 00:40:28
+0000 2008 ------- From the original bug report: " In the attached document, I would like to cut the table and caption and place it at the end of the document. I don't want to cut the heading that follows it, but I do want to cut the caption.
I highlight the caption and the table by dragging through the left margin area.
The heading turns to plaintext -- loses its formatting.

There just doesn't seem to be a way around this one! I am an advanced OOo user, I would say. I have used a lot of features for some pretty large reports, presentations, spreadsheets, etc. So I'm not just being stupid, I don't think. "
